script.dialog: This Unit has just discovered a new rare type of gift.
They have rare ones for me now?
This Unit will now explain |C3|Bounty Gifts.
Monsters will now rarely have |C3|Bounty Gifts|C0| for you.
Having more |C3|karma|C0| will increase the chance of finding them.
Unlike all other gift types, |C3|Bounty Gifts|C0| are actually received before the battle starts.
The effects of a |C3|Bounty Gift|C0| will only apply to that battle.
|C3|Bounty Gifts|C0| will always increase the amount of motes you extract.
I can get a better score with this!
There is also a second type of |C3|Bounty Gift.|C0|
|C3|Burdened Bounty Gifts|C0| will also increase your score.
However, they will also provide you with a negative burden effect.
This burden effect will still only apply for a single battle.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Be extra careful when choosing a monster with a |C3|Burdened Bounty Gift.|C0|
I'm already taking on their burdens.|L|What is the harm in taking one more?
This Unit is burdened with extreme temperature malfunctions.
